summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3995 for the improvement of North 35th Street from Evanston Avenue to West Canal Street; by regrading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48595, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
